page.title: 09THE ALTRINCHAM FESTIVAL 2
page.content: PEOPLE TRY TO ATTEND, LIKE THE M.P. FOR ALTRINCHAM,{SIR FERGUS MONTGOMERY. THE FESTIVAL QUEEN,MISS ALTRINCHAM,IS CHOSEN BY A PANEL OF 5 JUDGES ONE NIGHT AT THE {CRESTA COURT HOTEL.}THEY ARE CHOSEN ON APPEARANCE,DRESS, PERSONALITY AND SPEECH. DURING THE FESTIVAL{THE LIONS}AND {THE ROUND TABLE}PUT OUT COLLECTING BOXES.A SMALL PERCENTAGE OF THE MONEY RAISED BY THE LIONS, AND ABOUT HALF OF THAT RAISED BY THE ROUND TABLE,GOES TO THE FESTIVAL COMMITTEE. SOME OF THE LOCAL CHURCHES TAKE AN ACTIVE PART IN THE FESTIVAL BY ORGANISING SPECIAL EVENTS, LIKE YOUTH PARADES. THE FESTIVAL PROGRAMMES ARE DESIGNED BY THE PRINTER,STAPLED BY HAND AND DISTRIBUTED.THIS YEAR,1985, 1700 SHEETS OF PAPER WERE USED FOR THE PROGRAMMES.
